entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:28 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 04:30 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: NW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with periods of rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023
